title: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: When using the Code Assist feature, it does not respect the platform line ends.
OB: The Code Assist feature does not provide suggestions or completion options correctly based on the platform line ends.
EB: The Code Assist feature should provide accurate suggestions and completion options based on the platform line ends.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new class.
2. Add a method.
3. Define a local variable for an array.
